title: Taçsız Prenses
overview: Masal, who grew up with the tales of her dreamy mother, Şirin, is trapped in a cold and realistic world when her mother is hospitalized due to heart disease. As a result, she turns into a fierce, vicious girl who can do anything. The first person Masal will receive support from is her teacher Evgin, and things will turn around for everyone over time. On Masal's journey, she will complete the unfinished tales of the other heroes of the story one by one while searching for her own tale, and on this journey, the closest person to Masal will be her dog Köfte, who never leaves her side...
